translations.home.intro.paragraph1: This includes doctors, nurses, technicians, and anyone working alongside them during this crisis.
translations.home.intro.title: Welcome to Help Supply. We're helping medical professionals in NYC with their immediate needs around childcare, pet care, groceries and emotional support.
translations.home.needServices.description: I’m looking for support so I can keep working
translations.home.needServices.title: I’m a medical worker
translations.home.needSupplies.description: Items for use in the facility where I work
translations.home.needSupplies.title: Need supplies
translations.learnMore.faq.bullet1: Who can request help? Our focus is on helping anyone working for a NYC medical facility or EMT service treating people suffering from COVID-19. Support staff, nurses, and doctors are all encouraged to make requests.
translations.learnMore.faq.bullet2: How can I be sure that my request and information stay private? We share your data securely on a per-request basis with only the service organization that will fulfill your request.
translations.learnMore.faq.bullet3: Does Help Supply provide the volunteer services? No. We gather requests and then route them to the most appropriate of our partner organizations to provide volunteers to fulfill them. Our current partners include Mutual Aid NYC, Workers Need Childcare, and NYC COVID Care Network.
translations.learnMore.faq.bullet4: How long will I have to wait for help? Many people are in difficult situations, and the volume of requests is high. Our partners will contact you as soon as they can.
translations.learnMore.faq.bullet5: Will you expand to other cities besides NYC? We're currently working to expand to other cities. If you are a volunteer service organization and would like to work with us, please let us know at help@help.supply.
translations.learnMore.about.title: What we're doing
translations.learnMore.about.paragraph1: We quickly and seamlessly connect healthcare workers to the services and support they need to keep up the fight against COVID-19.
translations.learnMore.about.paragraph2: Healthcare workers have daily needs that are squeezed by the COVID-19 fight; needs like grocery shopping, childcare, pet care and mental health support are a challenge to meet. We've built relationships with trusted partners who have armies of volunteers ready to help and equipped with risk-reduction training and supplies. Launched in NYC, Help Supply is expanding to other hard-hit markets.
translations.learnMore.about.who.title: Who we are
translations.learnMore.about.who.paragraph1: We're a group of designers, technologists, medical students and community organizers from across the country who heard from the healthcare workers in their networks that they are being overwhelmed by this crisis.
translations.learnMore.about.who.paragraph2: Since many of us make digital products and services professionally, we decided to apply those skills to help solve everyday problems for healthcare workers so they can focus on caring for the infected.
translations.learnMore.about.partners.title: Our partners
translations.learnMore.about.partners.paragraph1: We're partnering with the following aid organizations:
translations.learnMore.about.partners.paragraph2: We're partnering with Mutual Aid NYC, Workers Need Childcare, and NYC COVID Care Network.
translations.learnMore.about.partners.paragraph3: We're looking for more organizations, especially in Detroit and New Orleans. If you're an organization providing aid and want to partner with Help Supply, contact us at help@help.supply.
translations.learnMore.contact.title: Contact
